title: How are our Google Ads campaigns perf...

messages.content: How are our Google Ads campaigns performing?

content.text: I'll retrieve the performance metrics for all Google Ads campaigns.

content.text:
Great! Here's a comprehensive overview of your Google Ads campaigns:

## Google Ads Portfolio Performance

**Overall:** 5 active campaigns | $210K total budget | $125.75K total spend

---

### Campaign Summary

| Brand | Budget | Spend | Pacing | Health | Impressions | Clicks | CTR | Conversions | CPA |
|-------|--------|-------|--------|--------|-------------|--------|-----|-------------|-----|
| **Apex Motors** | $60K | $38.8K | On Track | ‚úÖ Good | 4.25M | 89.2K | 2.1% | 312 | $124.20 |
| **TechFlow SaaS** | $40K | $24.8K | Behind | ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning | 3.18M | 42.9K | 1.35% | 186 | $133.33 |
| **FinanceFirst Bank** | $50K | $31.2K | On Track | ‚úÖ Good | 5.64M | 98.7K | 1.75% | 423 | $73.81 |
| **FreshBite Foods** | $25K | $11.4K | On Track | ‚úÖ Good | 1.52M | 18.2K | 1.2% | 95 | $120.00 |
| **UrbanLiving Real Estate** | $35K | $19.6K | On Track | ‚úÖ Good | 3.85M | 57.8K | 1.5% | 267 | $73.41 |

---

### üèÜ Top Performers

1. **FinanceFirst Bank** - Best CPA at $73.81 with highest conversions (423) and strong search CTR of 6.2%
2. **Apex Motors** - Highest CTR at 2.1% with excellent desktop performance (2.64% CTR)
3. **UrbanLiving Real Estate** - Strong mobile engagement (1.6% CTR) and solid CPA of $73.41

---

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Critical Attention Needed: TechFlow SaaS

**Status:** Behind pacing with Warning health

**Major Issue:** Broad match keywords are severely underperforming:
- Consuming **40% of budget** ($9,920)
- Producing only **15% of conversions** (28 conversions)
- **CPA of $354** vs exact match CPA of $68.50
- Quality score averaging only 3-4/10

**Recommended Action:** 
- Pause broad match keywords immediately
- Reallocate budget to exact match keywords (quality score 8-9, CPA $68.50)
- Display remarketing is performing well (1.19% CTR) - consider increasing allocation

---

### üìä Key Platform Metrics

**Quality Scores:**
- FinanceFirst: 7.8 ‚≠ê
- UrbanLiving: 7.5
- Apex Motors: 7.2
- TechFlow: 5.1 ‚ö†Ô∏è (dragged down by broad match)

**Impression Share:**
- FinanceFirst: 71%
- Apex Motors: 68%
- UrbanLiving: 62%
- TechFlow: 52% (losing share to budget & rank)

---

### üí° Quick Wins

1. **Apex Motors:** Shift more budget to desktop (2.64% CTR vs 1.92% mobile)
2. **TechFlow:** Fix broad match keyword issue for immediate CPA improvement
3. **FreshBite:** Strong YouTube view rate (26%) - continue video investment
4. **UrbanLiving:** New York performing best (1.7% CTR) - consider increasing geo weighting

Would you like me to make any optimizations to these campaigns, such as pausing TechFlow's broad match keywords or adjusting bids for Apex Motors desktop traffic?
